title: SOFT
long_description: SOFT improves water quality and bather’s comfort. It increases the solubility of salts in water, leaving water clearer, cleaner and softer to the skin. It also prevents algae growth. It is compatible with all types of sanitizers and its formula helps maintain a balanced pH.
short_description: BENEFIT Leaves a feeling of softness on the skin FORMAT 4 kg

characteristics.title: Application method
characteristics.text: Sprinkle lightly SOFT above the water return.

characteristics.title: Instructions
characteristics.text: Pour SOFT according to the application method and recommended dosage. For initial dosage, add the required quantity in 2 applications with a 1-hour interval. Wait 15 minutes, after the second application, before bathing.

dosage.specifications: At the beginning of the season, for initial treatment, add 500 g of SOFT per 10,000 L of pool water. Each month, add 250 g of SOFT per 10,000 L of pool water.

warning: Compatible with salt systems. DO NOT apply the product when swimmers are in the pool. DO NOT apply the product into the skimmer basket.
